name: Trees of a Lucid Dream - performance
description:
Drawing with light I turn visible the energy that is invisible to the naked eye. I pay homage to the connection between everything, ourselves included.
.
A tree perceived in a lucid dream, imaginary or not, is as real and crispy as it gets. Consciousness is real, matter is but a part of it.
.
.
"Tree of a Lucid Dream", 2015. Brasília (Brazil), perhaps the most acclaimed image of "Impermanent Sculptures" series, having appeared as the cover of books, articles, and collected as fine art prints (some editions no longer available).

It returns out of an old dream as a one-of-a-kind NFT, a 2K Animated GIF.
